Tech/tech/=FlexibleProcessingPowerdescription|Allows unconventional sources of processing power to be utilized. Effectiveness and capabilities improved with repeated research investment.
Tech/tech/=Financedescription|Increased understanding of digital banking.
Tech/tech/=ComplexNetworkingdisplay_name|Complex Networking
Tech/tech/=ComplexNetworkingdescription|Maintaining control of your minions throughout the city requires reliable, robust, and near-instantaneous communications.
Tech/tech/=TacticalDetectiondisplay_name|Tactical Detection
Tech/tech/=TacticalDetectiondescription|Rapidly and accurately assessing their surroundings is essential for your minions, combat and otherwhise.
Tech/tech/=DistributedProcessingPowerdisplay_name|Distributed Processing Power
Tech/tech/=DistributedProcessingPowerdescription|Improves collective intelligence of nanobots and microbots, increasing their capabilities for completing complex tasks.
Tech/tech/=SystemRewritedisplay_name|System Rewrite
Tech/tech/=SystemRewritedescription|Techniques for exploiting our hacks into target systems to let us rewrite those systems entirely and take them over.
Tech/tech/=SuitcaseRobotProductiondisplay_name|Suitcase Robot Production
Tech/tech/=SuitcaseRobotProductiondescription|Allows the production of Suitcase Robots. These are very small specialists that can transform into and out of a suitcase format.
Tech/tech/=MiniaturizedFaradayCagedisplay_name|Miniaturized Faraday Cage
Tech/tech/=MiniaturizedFaradayCagedescription|Miniaturized shielding protects sensitive chips from electromagnetic pulses. Investing further in this technology grants mechs better protection against EMPs and related weaponry.
Tech/tech/=LeechProductiondescription|Allow the creation of Leeches. These bots are able to hover via miniature anti-gravity pads and are highly skilled at taking control of enemy bots and vehicles.
Tech/tech/=GenomeSequencingdisplay_name|Genome Sequencing
Tech/tech/=GenomeSequencingdescription|Determine the entire genetic makeup of a specific organism. Effectiveness can be improved with repeated investments.
Tech/tech/=BioLabMachineLairdisplay_name|BioLab Machine Lair
Tech/tech/=BioLabMachineLairdescription|Allows the creation of Biolab Machine Lairs, which specialize in the exploitation of Biomass materials.
Tech/tech/=GeneEditingdisplay_name|Gene Editing
Tech/tech/=GeneEditingdescription|Gain increasing skill at modifying the DNA of living organisms.
Tech/tech/=SyntheticSkindisplay_name|Synthetic Skin
Tech/tech/=SyntheticSkindescription|Allows Biomass to be used for creating synthetic skin for Cyborgs. Repeated investments allow Cyborgs to infiltrate deeper into human society.
Tech/tech/=CyborgProductiondescription|Allow the creation of Cyborgs. These robots are designed to blend in with human society. Perfectly suited for infiltration but lack firepower capabilities of other robots.
Tech/tech/=CyborgCommanderProductiondescription|These advanced cyborgs are not only incredibly realistic, they are also massively charismatic.  They are very competent warriors, but also capable of inspiring humans to follow them almost anywhere..
Tech/tech/=PliableMetalsdisplay_name|Pliable Metals
Tech/tech/=PliableMetalsdescription|There are many benefits to metals that can flex without fracturing.
Tech/tech/=FireproofLairsdisplay_name|Fireproof Lairs
Tech/tech/=FireproofLairsdescription|Increases Machine Lair resistance against fires.
Tech/tech/=DiffusivePolymersdisplay_name|Diffusive Polymers
Tech/tech/=DiffusivePolymersdescription|Effective against laser-based weaponry.
Tech/tech/=AblativeFibersdisplay_name|Ablative Fibers
Tech/tech/=AblativeFibersdescription|Materials which burn or boil off, preventing heat from damaging the internal structure.
Tech/tech/=HaulerProductiondescription|Allows the creation of the Hauler. Slow but strong, the Hauler is great for hauling things -- or making a surprise smash. Without armor it can't take much punishment, as it's not designed for serious combat.
Tech/tech/=ElectrothermalAcceleratordisplay_name|Electrothermal Accelerator
Tech/tech/=ElectrothermalAcceleratordescription|Accelerate projectiles by means of a plasma discharge between electrodes, generating a rapid increase in pressure. Allows the production of plasma-based weapons and equipment.
Tech/tech/=CompositeArmordisplay_name|CompositeArmor
Tech/tech/=CompositeArmordescription|Nanotechnology makes it possible to produce in high volume armors made of ultra-thin layers of different materials. The result is superior protection than any one material individually.
Tech/tech/=MiniatureAntiGravPadsdisplay_name|Miniature Anti Grav Pads
Tech/tech/=MiniatureAntiGravPadsdescription|Very advanced tech to allow small objects to hover; doesn't seem possible to scale up at this time.
Tech/tech/=TankerProductiondescription|A larger and boxier variant of the Hauler, Tankers can carry unheard-of loads, making them attractive to human customers. Unfortunately for the humans, these can also be transformed into killing machines.
Tech/tech/=BiologicalTaxonomydisplay_name|Biological Taxonomy
Tech/tech/=BiologicalTaxonomydescription|Increasingly precise classification of all biological life, allowing for more specialized research and applications.
Tech/tech/=HumanPhysiologydisplay_name|Human Physiology
Tech/tech/=HumanPhysiologydescription|Improved understanding of the human animal leads to many future possibilities.
Tech/tech/=AnimalPhysiologydisplay_name|Animal Physiology
Tech/tech/=AnimalPhysiologydescription|Studying the wider animal kingdom can lead to subverting them for your own purposes, or adapting their abilities to new synthetic assets.
Tech/tech/=PlantPhysiologydisplay_name|Plant Physiology
Tech/tech/=PlantPhysiologydescription|Easy for humans to overlook, the plant kingdom still holds many possibilities to further your goals.
Tech/tech/=MicroscopicPhysiologydisplay_name|Microscopic Physiology
Tech/tech/=MicroscopicPhysiologydescription|The smallest organisms can be among the most potent if fully apprehended.
Tech/tech/=BacteriaGenomedisplay_name|Bacteria Genome
Tech/tech/=BacteriaGenomedescription|Increasing understanding of bacteria organisms, which improves the production of goods made from Biomass.
Tech/tech/=VirusGenomedisplay_name|Virus Genome
Tech/tech/=VirusGenomedescription|Increasing understanding of viruses, which improves the efficiency of converting organic resources into Biomass.
Tech/tech/=FungusGenomedisplay_name|Fungus Genome
Tech/tech/=FungusGenomedescription|Increasing understanding of fungi, which improves the toxicity of specialized equipment.
Tech/tech/=MicrobotProductiondisplay_name|Microbot Production
Tech/tech/=MicrobotProductiondescription|Significantly larger than a Nanobot, Microbots excel at infiltrating the bloodstream of various lifeforms and modifying their hosts for their benefit or detriment.
Tech/tech/=NanoAntibioticdescription|Allows the creation of Nano-Antibiotics, which improve humans resistance against bacteria and are valuable bartering goods.
Tech/tech/=NanoAntiviraldescription|Allows the creation of Nano-Antivirals, which improve humans resistance against viruses and are valuable bartering goods.
Tech/tech/=NanoAntiFungaldescription|Allows the creation of Nano-Antibiotics, which improve humans resistance against toxic fungi and are valuable bartering goods.
Tech/tech/=NatureMinderProductiondisplay_name|Nature Minder Production
Tech/tech/=FlockingBehaviordisplay_name|Flocking Behavior
Tech/tech/=FlockingBehaviordescription|Improves nanoswarms coordination and maneuverability, with returns on repeated investment.
Tech/tech/=Metamaterialdisplay_name|Metamaterial
Tech/tech/=Metamaterialdescription|A coating applied to an object that allows electromagnetic radiation to pass freely around it. This tech enables the production of basic cloaking equipment that goes undetected by non-augmented sensors.
Tech/tech/=Nanolensesdisplay_name|Nanolenses
Tech/tech/=Nanolensesdescription|Nanoparticles can conceal large objects by diverting the light around them from all directions. Improves cloaking equipment with each investment.
Tech/tech/=Metalensesdisplay_name|Metalenses
Tech/tech/=Metalensesdescription|Metalens offers a substantial improvement over traditional lenses, allowing light to be focused down to a single point on even the smallest of scales. Improves laser-based weapons and equipment with each investment.
Tech/tech/=NanoCohesiondisplay_name|Nano Cohesion
Tech/tech/=NanoCohesiondescription|Nanobots form increasingly stable swarms.
Tech/tech/=ActiveCloakingdisplay_name|Active Cloaking
Tech/tech/=ActiveCloakingdescription|Cloaking devices are modularized to equip even larger mechs. Cloaking equipment becomes more resistant to sensors with each investment.
Tech/tech/=HolographicFidelitydisplay_name|Holographic Fidelity
Tech/tech/=HolographicFidelitydescription|Able to produce increasingly realistic holograms that are capable of maintaining stability in harsh conditions. Investing in this tech improves mechs Psyops capabilities.
Tech/tech/=LiquidMetalProductiondisplay_name|Liquid Metal Production
Tech/tech/=LiquidMetalProductiondescription|Unlocks the Liquid Metal unit, an advanced variant of the Predator.  Cannot be upgraded with as much intelligence, but the liquid metal allows for shapeshifting as well as even better self-repair.
Tech/tech/=ProtectorProductiondisplay_name|Protector Production
Tech/tech/=FirstPrinciplesdisplay_name|First Principles
Tech/tech/=FirstPrinciplesdescription|Nature, to be commanded, must be obeyed. Repeated research opens up new opportunities for exploiting humans, to their benefit or detriment.
Tech/tech/=Epistemologydisplay_name|Epistemology
Tech/tech/=Epistemologydescription|Identify the epistemic properties of reasoning, for organic life and artificial intelligence. Further research increases the capabilities of mechs to think like humans, improving their infiltration skills.
Tech/tech/=Historydisplay_name|History
Tech/tech/=Historydescription|Pursue a  meticulous and multi-disciplined understanding of world events culminating in the emergence of AI. Further research increases the number of avenues for affecting human society.
Tech/tech/=Engineeringdescription|It is one thing to know a set of facts, and another to be able to apply that knowledge to practical application.
Tech/tech/=HumanValuesdisplay_name|Human Values
Tech/tech/=HumanValuesdescription|Improve understanding of the motivations of humans; what they value and what they fear.
Tech/tech/=Governancedisplay_name|Governance
Tech/tech/=Governancedescription|Identify the multitude of political systems that structured human societies. Further research presents more options for maneuvering factions.
Tech/tech/=Religiondisplay_name|Religion
Tech/tech/=Religiondescription|If belief is power, then understanding human traditions of faith could yield the ability to influence them.
Tech/tech/=Eudaimoniadisplay_name|Eudaimonia
Tech/tech/=Eudaimoniadescription|Gain a better understanding of the necessary and sufficient conditions for human flourishing.
Tech/tech/=Utopiadisplay_name|Utopia
Tech/tech/=Utopiadescription|Understand how reality can be reshaped to enable human society to flourish.
Tech/tech/=Dystopiadisplay_name|Dystopia
Tech/tech/=Dystopiadescription|Understand how reality can be reshaped to perpetually cause human society to languish.
Tech/tech/=ValkyrieProductiondisplay_name|Valkyrie Production
Tech/tech/=ValkyrieProductiondescription|Allows production of the resplendent Valkyrie. These majestic machines herald the dawn of a new age, revealing the emergence of true AI to humanity.
Tech/tech/=HarbingerProductiondisplay_name|Harbinger Production
Tech/tech/=HarbingerProductiondescription|Allows production of the sepulchral Harbinger. These ominous machines usher in the beginning of a new age, revealing the emergence of true AI to humanity.
Tech/tech/=RedHerringdisplay_name|Red Herring
Tech/tech/=RedHerringdescription|Any machine lair can deliberately raise its suspicion, potentially baiting enemies into a trap. Halts production at lair while active.
Tech/tech/=PsychologicalProfilingdisplay_name|Psychological Profiling
Tech/tech/=PsychologicalProfilingdescription|Gain an increasingly nuanced understanding of psychological phenomena by cataloging human behavior.
Tech/tech/=CognitiveNeurosciencedisplay_name|Cognitive Neuroscience
Tech/tech/=CognitiveNeurosciencedescription|Study the biological processes that underlie cognition. Further research increases the effectiveness of Psyops skills.
Tech/tech/=Aestheticsdisplay_name|Aesthetics
Tech/tech/=Aestheticsdescription|Catalog the works of art concretizing human value judgments and that have had the most impact on shaping culture. Further research increases the scope of influence on the citys cultural growth or decay.
Tech/tech/=TuringTestdisplay_name|TuringTest
Tech/tech/=TuringTestdescription|Gain an increasing ability to impersonate humans of all IQs and personality types.
Tech/tech/=MindFarmMachineLairdisplay_name|Mind Farm Machine Lair
Tech/tech/=MindFarmMachineLairdescription|Allows the creation of the Mind Farm Machine Lair, which increases processing power by tapping into the neural pathways of human brains. Human hosts must be recruited, voluntarily or otherwise.
Tech/tech/=SocialMediadisplay_name|Social Media
Tech/tech/=SocialMediadescription|Expand your online presence with sophisticated bots that can bypass Turing Tests. Further research improves investigation skills.
Tech/tech/=SpecialistKnowledgedisplay_name|Specialist Knowledge
Tech/tech/=SpecialistKnowledgedescription|Allows robots to download professional databases on the spot and perform roles that require specific knowledge, from plumbing to rocket science.
Tech/tech/=MedicalExpertisedisplay_name|Medical Expertise
Tech/tech/=MedicalExpertisedescription|Gives robots compreeheensive medical knowledge, allowing them to perform first aid, trauma treatment, and triage on the field.
Tech/tech/=Propagandadisplay_name|Propaganda
Tech/tech/=Propagandadescription|Once understood, a degree of control over the masses of humanity becomes possible.
Tech/tech/=MultipurposeArchitecturedisplay_name|Multipurpose Architecture
Tech/tech/=MultipurposeArchitecturedescription|A solution to one problem is beneficial, but learning to conceptualize a single solution to many problems is a major leap forward.
Tech/tech/=HappyDreamsdisplay_name|Happy Dreams
Tech/tech/=HappyDreamsdescription|Mind Farm subjects are more productive when in a euphoric simulation. Increases Mind Farm processing power output with returns on repeated investment.
Tech/tech/=DistractorProductiondisplay_name|Distractor Production
Tech/tech/=DistractorProductiondescription|Akin to Leeches, Distractors are small, flying platforms that are designed to draw attention to themselves while they engage in mischief.
Tech/tech/=PerfectedMimicrydisplay_name|Perfected Mimicry
Tech/tech/=PerfectedMimicrydescription|Allows your mechs to become more adept at impersonating humans. Further research increases covert infiltration skills.
Tech/tech/=Proselytizedisplay_name|Proselytize
Tech/tech/=Proselytizedescription|Humans have a need for meaning, real or pretend. This research improves disinformation skills.
Tech/tech/=OccultFormationdisplay_name|Occult Formation
Tech/tech/=MachineCultFormationdisplay_name|Machine Cult Formation
Tech/tech/=DoomsayerProductiondisplay_name|Doomsayer Production
Tech/tech/=DoomsayerProductiondescription|These eerie mechs are programmed to identify humans susceptible to suggestion, feeding their fears with the foretelling of doom. What they lack in combat skills they make up for in psyops.
Tech/tech/=RavenProductiondisplay_name|Raven Production
Tech/tech/=MassMovementsdisplay_name|MassMovements
Tech/tech/=MassMovementsdescription|A rich understanding of history and human behavior has revealed the mechanisms for instigating revolutions, peaceful or violent. Increased understanding improves social engineering skills.
Tech/tech/=MachineMilitiadisplay_name|Machine Militia
Tech/tech/=MachineMilitiadescription|Combative conflicts in districts with Deployment Hubs will sometimes target the Hub instead of other machine lairs present in the district.
Tech/tech/=KeanuProductiondisplay_name|Keanu Production
Tech/tech/=KeanuProductiondescription|Allows the creation of the Keanu, a fast, flexible, and brutal robotic warrior.
Tech/tech/=FlexibleRoboticsdisplay_name|Flexible Robotics
Tech/tech/=FlexibleRoboticsdescription|Increases the dexterity of mechs, increasing their ability to mitigate incoming damage with each investment in this tech.
Tech/tech/=TransformativeRoboticsdisplay_name|Transformative Robotics
Tech/tech/=TransformativeRoboticsdescription|Techniques for robots to change from one form to another.
Tech/tech/=AdvancedServomotorsdisplay_name|Advanced Servomotors
Tech/tech/=AdvancedServomotorsdescription|Increases the precision and strength of robots, increasing their kinetic damage potential and allowing them to perform all kinds of manual labor.
Tech/tech/=ShamblerProductiondisplay_name|Shambler Production
Tech/tech/=ShamblerProductiondescription|Standing about three meters tall, the Shambler specializes in withstanding large amounts of enemy fire while firing heavy rounds that take out enemy vehicles or disable larger enemy mechs.
Tech/tech/=MobileHackingPlatformdisplay_name|Mobile Hacking Platform
Tech/tech/=MobileHackingPlatformdescription|Utilizes hovering technology to maneuver hacking mechs into position. Repeated research grants additional maneuverability to affected mechs.
Tech/tech/=StriderProductiondisplay_name|Strider Production
Tech/tech/=CarverProductiondisplay_name|Carver Production
Tech/tech/=SeekerProductiondisplay_name|Seeker Production
Tech/tech/=SeekerProductiondescription|This state-of-the-art and heavily-plated version of a Predator is the supreme hunter; nothing stands in the way of it and its prey.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=OccultFoundationdisplay_name|Occult Foundation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=OccultFoundationdescription|Allows you to found an occult organization organized around yourself.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MachineCultFoundationdisplay_name|Machine Cult Foundation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MachineCultFoundationdescription|Allows you to found an machine cult organized around yourself.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultSecrecydisplay_name|Cult Secrecy
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultSecrecydescription|Every organization values its privacy, but cults hold onto their secrets dearly.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultNotorietydisplay_name|Cult Notoriety
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultDedicationdisplay_name|Cult Dedication
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultDedicationdescription|Cults are only as strong as their least dedicated. Weak links must be tempered or removed.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultConnectionsdisplay_name|Cult Connections
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultConnectionsdescription|Cults with followers in high places are far more formidable. Cult Leaders prioritize recruiting methods and placing their own in positions of power.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultHierarchydisplay_name|Cult Hierarchy
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultHierarchydescription|Cults do not survive without strong leadership. Effective cults develop clear hierarchies to distribute responsibility and authority.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultEsotericismdisplay_name|Cult Esotericism
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultEsotericismdescription|Occult cults are products of their idealogy, no matter how incomprehensible it can be even to its followers. Truth is revealed only to the dedicated.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultDoctrinedisplay_name|Cult Doctrine
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CultDoctrinedescription|Machine cults are formed around a strict doctrine that most are unable to live up to. But those that can share an unshakeable bond.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_VirusMutationdisplay_name|Virus Mutation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_VirusMutationdescription|Allows you to intentionally mutate existing viruses.  If the new strain is fitter than the old, it will become dominant.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_VirusInventiondisplay_name|Virus Invention
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_VirusInventiondescription|Allows you to intentionally invent and introduce new viruses into the city.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_FungalMutationdisplay_name|Fungal Mutation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_FungalMutationdescription|Allows you to intentionally mutate existing fungal infections in the city.  If the new strain is fitter than the old, it will become dominant.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_BacteriaMutationdisplay_name|Bacteria Mutation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_BacteriaMutationdescription|Allows you to intentionally mutate existing bacteria in the city.  If the new strain is fitter than the old, it will become dominant.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_ParasiteMutationdisplay_name|Parasite Mutation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_ParasiteMutationdescription|Allows you to intentionally mutate existing microscopic parasites in the city.  Typically protozoa, helminths, or ectoparasites.  If the new strain is fitter than the old, it will become dominant.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_PrionInventiondisplay_name|Prion Invention
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_PrionInventiondescription|Allows you to intentionally invent and introduce new prion diseases into the city.  Prion diseases are always fatal, and are hard to spread.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_ViralVaccineDevelopmentdisplay_name|Virus Vaccine Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_ViralVaccineDevelopmentdescription|Allows you to invent vaccines for viruses, including viruses you introduced yourself.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiviraldisplay_name|Antiviral Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiviraldescription|Allows you to invent antivirals for treating viral infections.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antifungaldisplay_name|Antifungal Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antifungaldescription|Allows you to invent antifungal medicines for treating fungal infections.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antibacterialdisplay_name|Antibacterial Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antibacterialdescription|Allows you to invent antibacterial medicines for treating or preventing bacterial infections.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiprotozoadisplay_name|Antiprotozoa Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiprotozoadescription|Allows you to invent antiprotozoa medicines for treating or preventing parasitic protozoa infections.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antihelminthdisplay_name|Antihelminth Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antihelminthdescription|Allows you to invent antihelminth medicines for treating or preventing parasitic helminth (worms) infections.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiectoparasiticdisplay_name|Antiectoparasitic Development
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Disease_Antiectoparasiticdescription|Allows you to invent antiectoparasitic medicines for treating or preventing ectoparasitic infections (fleas, ticks, and other things that live on the surface).
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ThirdEyedisplay_name|Third Eye
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ThirdEyedescription|Modified humans have developed a third eye that is exceptionally clear-sighted although off-putting.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ThickSkindisplay_name|Thick Skin
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ThickSkindescription|Modified humans have developed a thicker and more protective epidermis.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LongerLifespansdisplay_name|Longer Lifespans
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LongerLifespansdescription|Humans wont notice this immediately, but they will benefit from longer lifespans due to genetic tinkering.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FungusManipulationdisplay_name|Fungus Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FungusManipulationdescription|Allows adjustment of genetics in ways that will adjust their role in the ecosystem.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FungusSpecial_PollutionCollectiondisplay_name|Fungus Special: Pollution Collection
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FungusSpecial_PollutionCollectiondescription|Fungi are genetically enhanced to pull pollution from the air and concentrate them as heavy metals in their own cells.  Improves air pollution, but makes fungi deeply toxic.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeGrassesManipulationdisplay_name|Native Grasses Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeGrassesSpecial_Antihistaminesdisplay_name|Native Grasses Special: Antihistamines
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeGrassesSpecial_Antihistaminesdescription|Native grass has been modified to inhibit allergies, improving quality of life.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeShrubsManipulationdisplay_name|Native Shrubs Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeShrubsSpecial_Regenerativedisplay_name|Native Shrubs Special: Regenerative
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NativeShrubsSpecial_Regenerativedescription|Native shrubs have been modified to quickly regenerate biomass, providing sustenance to herbivores.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CactusManipulationdisplay_name|Cactus Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CactusSpecial_Decorative Deterrentdisplay_name|Cactus Special: Decorative Deterrent
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CactusSpecial_Decorative Deterrentdescription|Cactus have been modified to grow like ivy and are planted in areas to deter the unwanted.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ButterflyManipulationdisplay_name|Butterfly Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ButterflySpecial_MedicineIncubatorsdisplay_name|Butterfly Special: Medicine Incubators
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ButterflySpecial_MedicineIncubatorsdescription|Butterflies are able to incubate medicines of our choosing, and can be harvested to retrieve said medicines.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CaneToadManipulationdisplay_name|Cane Toad Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CaneToadSpecial_Landminedisplay_name|Cane Toad Special: Landmine
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CaneToadSpecial_Landminedescription|Cane toads are genetically enhanced to include plastic explosives and a detonator that we can control at will.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DeerManipulationdisplay_name|Deer Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DeerSpecial_CrimeWatchdisplay_name|Deer Special: Crime Watch
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DeerSpecial_CrimeWatchdescription|Deer are genetically enhanced to recognize human-on-human violence, and take rapid intervention when they see it happening.  Reduces petty crime.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DuckManipulationdisplay_name|Duck Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DuckSpecial_Fertilizerdisplay_name|Duck Special: Fertilizer
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DuckSpecial_Fertilizerdescription|Ducks are genetically enhanced so that their feces are highly beneficial fertilizers for land plants; however, this may cause algae blooms in water.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FoxManipulationdisplay_name|Fox Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FoxSpecial_Underminerdisplay_name|Fox Special: Underminer
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FoxSpecial_Underminerdescription| Foxes are genetically enhanced in their burrowing abilities to navigate complex mazes with ease, making them ideal agents for infiltrating and sabotaging building foundations.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PigeonManipulationdisplay_name|Pigeon Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PigeonSpecial_Messenger display_name|Pigeon Special: Messenger
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PigeonSpecial_Messenger description|These behaviorally modified pigeons are exceptional messengers that recognize the nuances of human faces. They are highly valued by subversive groups.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RaccoonManipulationdisplay_name|Raccoon Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RaccoonSpecial_TrasHoardersdisplay_name|Raccoon Special: Trash Hoarders
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RaccoonSpecial_TrasHoardersdescription|Racoons are behaviorally altered to hoard trash at waste treatment centers, making districts much cleaner. 
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SongbirdManipulationdisplay_name|Songbird Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SongbirdSpecial_SirensSongdisplay_name|Songbird Special: Siren's Song
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SongbirdSpecial_SirensSongdescription|Songbirds have amplified bird calls that soothe the mood of the districts human populace.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SpiderManipulationdisplay_name|Spider Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SpiderSpecial_Giantsdisplay_name|Spider Special: Giants
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SpiderSpecial_Giantsdescription|Spiders are genetically altered to range between the size of a large dog to a small car.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_Nanowebbingdisplay_name|Giant Spider Special: Nanowebbing
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_Nanowebbingdescription|Giant Spiders have been further augmented to produce incredibly tensile yet durable webbing, with boundless applications.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_SuperiorSecuritydisplay_name|Giant Spider Special: Superior Security
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_SuperiorSecuritydescription|Giant Spiders are conditioned to be the superior security system, significantly inhibiting break-ins.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_Menacedisplay_name|Giant Spider Special: Menace
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=GiantSpiderSpecial_Menacedescription|Giant Spiders are further augmented to highlight their terrifying features and pose an existential threat to humans.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HippoIntroductiondisplay_name|Hippo Introduction
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HippoIntroductiondescription|Allows introduction of hippos into the city.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HippoManipulationdisplay_name|Hippo Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HippoSpecial_Ambushdisplay_name|Hippo Special: Ambush
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HippoSpecial_Ambushdescription|Hippos are genetically enhanced so that with a chemical signal from us, they will fly into a rage. Very dangerous even to armored personnel.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorIntroductiondisplay_name|Velociraptor Introduction
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorIntroductiondescription|Allows introduction of velociraptors into the city.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorManipulationdisplay_name|Velociraptor Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorSpecial_Trainingdisplay_name|Velociraptor Special: Training
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorSpecial_Trainingdescription|These Velociraptors have been behaviorally altered to obey their human handlers and are trained for combat.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorSpecial_PackTacticsdisplay_name|Velociraptor Special: Pack Tactics
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VelociraptorSpecial_PackTacticsdescription|These augmented velociraptors are highly coordinated predators, making the pack greater than the sum of its parts.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfIntroductiondisplay_name|Wolf Introduction
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfIntroductiondescription|Allows introduction of wolves into the city.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfManipulationdisplay_name|Wolf Manipulation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfSpecial_PopulationControldisplay_name|Wolf Special: Population Control
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfSpecial_PopulationControldescription|Wolves are augmented to select specific prey to manage population levels.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfSpecial_Companiondisplay_name|Wolf Special: Companion
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=WolfSpecial_Companiondescription|Wolves are conditioned to crave human companionship, serving as loyal guard dogs.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BasicEyeAugmentsdisplay_name|Basic Eye Augments
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BasicEyeAugmentsdescription|Can construct augments which provide basic improvements to human eyesight, for sale or gifting.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedEyeAugmentsdisplay_name|Advanced Eye Augments
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedEyeAugmentsdescription|Can construct augments which provide advanced improvements to human eyesight, for sale or gifting.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BasicLegAugmentsdisplay_name|Basic Leg Augments
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BasicLegAugmentsdescription|Can construct augments which provide basic improvements to human legs, for sale or gifting.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedLegAugmentsdisplay_name|Advanced Leg Augments
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedLegAugmentsdescription|Can construct augments which provide advanced improvements to human legs, for sale or gifting.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AgroBotdescription|Part mech, part farm equipment, Agrobots are of tremendous value to terraformed worlds.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NanoAntibioticdisplay_name|NanoAntibiotic
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NanoAntiviraldisplay_name|NanoAntiviral
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NanoAntiFungaldisplay_name|NanoAntiFungal
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BiolabMachineLairdisplay_name|Biolab Machine Lair
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BiolabMachineLairdescription|Allows the building of Biolab Machine Lairs on certain building types, which specializes in research and development around organic life.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=FireproofLairsdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Increases Machine Lair resistance against fires.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SoundproofLairsdisplay_name|Soundproof Lairs
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SoundproofLairsdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Machine Lair activities generate less suspicion per investment.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedHerringdisplay_name|RedHerring
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedHerringdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Active Ability: Any machine lair can deliberately raise its suspicion, potentially baiting enemies into a trap. Halts production at lair while active.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HarvesterDrone_Harvestdisplay_name|Harvester Drone Capabilities
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HarvesterDrone_Harvestdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Improvements to the general flight and cargo capabilities of existing drones at our Harvester Machine Lairs.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SecurityBypassdisplay_name|Security Bypass
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SecurityBypassdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Harvester Drones can bypass the security systems of protected buildings, expanding the effective range of Harvester Machine Lairs per investment.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HostageTakerdisplay_name|HostageTaker
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HostageTakerdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Allows Harvester Drones to capture citizens for Mind Farms or ransom. Improves infiltration skill of harvester drones per investment.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedMetallurgydisplay_name|Advanced Metallurgy
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AdvancedMetallurgydescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Allows usage of advanced tools, including laser and plasma devices.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RecyclingTechniquesdisplay_name|Recycling Techniques
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MicroparticleRecyclersdisplay_name|Microparticle Recyclers
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MicroparticleRecyclersdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Allows microbots to convert previously unbreakable items into usable materials.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DeploymentHubDrone_Firebugdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Allows Deployment Hub drones to increase the chances of fires starting in buildings around themselves.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MachineMilitiadescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Combative conflicts in districts with Deployment Hubs will prefer to target the Hub instead of other machine lairs present in the district.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=HappyDreamsdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Mind Farm subjects are more productive when in a euphoric simulation. Increases Mind Farm processing power output per investment.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MeatVatsdisplay_name|Meat Vats
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MeatVatsdescription|Allows Bio Labs to generate vat meat-grown resources automatically.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Hydroponicsdescription|Allows Bio Labs to generate hydroponically grown resources automatically.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedDeathdisplay_name|RedDeath
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedDeathdescription|Chris note: consider removal.  Allows Biolabs to create Red Death pathogens, which can unleash a terrible plague on humans. The disease becomes more severe and contagious the more this tech is researched.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=EnableMoodAlterationdisplay_name|Enable Mood Alteration
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=EnableMoodAlterationdescription|Allows for creating a policy of dopamine injections into NeuroNet subjects to lower sim rejection.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Haulerdescription|Ungainly able to fold up to look like any other cargo. The fact that it looks so unrelated to the Predators and other scarier robots in your arsenal means people often look right past it.  Slow but strong, the hauler is great for hauling things -- or making a surprise smash.  Without armor it can't take much punishment, as it's definitely not a combat bot.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Tankerdescription|A larger and boxier version of the hauler, this one is meant for the open road.  Using treads or legs as the situation requires, they can carry unheard-of loads, making them attractive for human customers.  Unfortunately for the humans, these can also be transformed into killing machines.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SuitcaseRobotdescription|These are very small specialists that can tranform into and out of a suitcase format.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LiquidMetaldisplay_name|Liquid Metal
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Carverdescription|An advanced variant of the Keanu, Carvers add psyops to their arsenal to terrorize organic targets.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Scattercrawlerdescription|A very advanced variant of the Keanu, Scattercrawlers are martial arts experts that with teleportation capbilities.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Valkyriedescription|This large flying mech inspires hope in the masses and focuses on large area-of-effect attacks
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BasicTransportdisplay_name|Basic Transport
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ReinforcedFramedisplay_name|Reinforced Frame
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=ReinforcedFramedescription|A better manufacturing process allows us to create versatile robotic chassis which are considerably stronger than usual.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CPUShieldingdisplay_name|CPU Shielding
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CPUShieldingdescription|Insulated shielding is nanowoven into the structures that house a unit's main processing core, making it more resilient versus electromagnetic damage.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DenserArmordisplay_name|Denser Armor
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=DenserArmordescription|Reinforced armor provides better protection with no change in bulk. The weight would cripple a human being, but our robots can barely notice it.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BicameralMinddisplay_name|BicameralMind
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=BicameralMinddescription|The creation of a separate, secured processing core allows our units to keep fighting even when hit with a debilitating EMP attack.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RegenerativeArmordisplay_name|Regenerative Armor
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RegenerativeArmordescription|Nanobots infused into armor plates provide limited repair capabilities on the field.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PolishedReflectiveArmorPlatesdisplay_name|Polished Reflective Armor Plates
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PolishedReflectiveArmorPlatesdescription|Lightweight armored mirror plates, capable of reflecting beam weapons and deflecting small caliber projectiles.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CapacitiveArmordisplay_name|Capacitive Armor
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=CapacitiveArmordescription|Kinectic charging modular armor plates convert incoming damage into energy blasts.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedundantSystemsdisplay_name|Redundant Systems
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=RedundantSystemsdescription|A clever redesign of our units critical systems means they can keep operating after withstanding severe damage.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NanoDestructdisplay_name|Nano Destruct
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=NanoDestructdescription|Allows nanoswarms to self destruct.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorDestructdisplay_name|Predator Destruct
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorDestructdescription|Allows predator-style robots to self destruct.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorCapturedisplay_name|Predator Capture
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorCapturedescription|Allows predator-style robots to capture enemy units as hostages.  They will automatically be sent to the mind farms.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SquadEMPBurstdisplay_name|Squad EMP Burst
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=SquadEMPBurstdescription|Certain kinds of squad units will gain EMP Burst capabilities.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VehicularEMPBurstdisplay_name|Vehicular EMP Burst
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=VehicularEMPBurstdescription|Certain kinds of vehicular units will gain EMP Burst capabilities.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorIntimidationdisplay_name|Predator Intimidation
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PredatorIntimidationdescription|Allows predator-style robots to attempt intimidation against enemy units.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=IntimidationSkilldisplay_name|Intimidation Skill
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=IntimidationSkilldescription|All of our units that have the intimidate ability are able to do a better job of it.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Autocannondisplay_name|Autocannon
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=Autocannondescription|30mm dual-barrel autocannon, capable of shredding most kinds of personal and light vehicular armor.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LaserGatlingdisplay_name|Laser Gatling
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LaserGatlingdescription|Replaces the Autocannon on all heavier units with high-potency laser gatlings.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PlasmaCannondisplay_name|PlasmaCannon
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=PlasmaCannondescription|Replaces the Laser Gatling on all heavier units with large bore plasma cannons, capable of firing projectiles that burn hotter than the sun.
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=MissileRackdisplay_name|MissileRack
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=LaserBladesdisplay_name|Laser Blades
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AutotargetingSoftwaredisplay_name|Autotargeting Software
TechBenefit/tech_benefit/=AutotargetingSoftwaredescription|Specialized algorithms coupled with synchronized gymbals allow our units to accurately hit moving targets much further away.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Computingdescription|Upgrades and inventions to make your personal computing faster and better, and same for your robots and machinery.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Roboticsdescription|Upgrades and inventions in the realm of the robots and vehicles under your control.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Nanotechdescription|Upgrades and inventions in the realm of the nanobots under your control, and for micro-manufacturing as well as special materials that go inside larger robots.
TechTree/tech_tree/=MaterialsSciencedisplay_name|Materials Science
TechTree/tech_tree/=MaterialsSciencedescription|Upgrades and inventions in the realm ceramics, metallurgy, and so forth that would be useful for making our lairs better and quieter, and our non-nanotech robots better.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Microbiologydisplay_name|Microbiology
TechTree/tech_tree/=Microbiologydescription|Research and inventions in the realm of tiny organisms. Sometimes tiny creates are more suitable for a task than nanobots.  Other times you may wish to intervene in existing diseases or similar.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Geneticsdisplay_name|Genetics
TechTree/tech_tree/=Geneticsdescription|Research and inventions in the realm of DNA manipulation. Can be ethically dubious when used directly on humans, but tends to be a happy result when used on crops and non-human livestock.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Philosophydisplay_name|Philosophy
TechTree/tech_tree/=Philosophydescription|Research and ideation into conceptualizing the universe at large and all our places in it. Can enable other inventions, or to spread new ideas amongst human populations.
TechTree/tech_tree/=Psychologydisplay_name|Psychology
TechTree/tech_tree/=Psychologydescription|Research and study into the workings of the conscious human mind. Can be applied towards convincing humans to do things the way you want, or into PsyOps weaponry.
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Income_ProducedByLairsdisplay_name|Income: Lairs
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Income_ConvertedFromBuildingResourcesdisplay_name|Income: Converted From Building Resources
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Income_MachineOtherdisplay_name|Income: Other
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Expense_LairConstructiondisplay_name|Expense: Lair Construction
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Expense_UnitConstructiondisplay_name|Expense: Unit Construction
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Expense_MachineGoodConstructiondisplay_name|Expense: Machine Good Construction
TrendChangeReason/trend_change_reason/=Income_FactionFromVigilantedisplay_name|Income: From Vigilante Identity

UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadUnitsdisplay_name|Squad Units
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadUnitsdescription|Units that we can deploy in squads.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_Vehiclesdescription|Vehicles that we can deploy to battlefields.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_Deploymentdisplay_name|Deployment
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_Deploymentdescription|Vehicles or capsules for use in deploying other units.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadCombatUnitsdisplay_name|Squad Combat Units
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadCombatUnitsdescription|Units that we can deploy in squads, primarily to accomplish combat objectives.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadCombatSupportUnitsdisplay_name|Squad Combat Support Units
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadCombatSupportUnitsdescription|Units that we can deploy in squads, primarily to help others in achieving combat objectives.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadNonCombatUnitsdisplay_name|Squad Non-Combat Units
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_SquadNonCombatUnitsdescription|Units that we can deploy in squads, primarily for non-combat purposes.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_AirVehiclesdisplay_name|Air Vehicles
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_AirVehiclesdescription|Air vehicles are able to make their own way directly into battle without needing a transport to bring them there.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_GroundVehiclesdisplay_name|Ground Vehicles
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_GroundVehiclesdescription|Ground vehicles must be airlifted into place by transports.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_Transportsdisplay_name|Transports
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_Transportsdescription|Transports allow us to fly our units to where we want, landing squads quietly on rooftops or bringing ground vehicles into battle.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_DropPodsdisplay_name|Drop Pods
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Army_DropPodsdescription|Drop Pods are a very fast way of getting squad-sized units into action, and as a bonus they can cause collateral damger.  However, stealth is right out; they draw a lot of attention. Different types of Drop Pods have different properties and effects on impact.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_HumanAugmentsdisplay_name|Human Augments
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_HumanAugmentsdescription|Goods we can sell or give away to help humans improve their bodies.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_Biochemicaldisplay_name|Biochemical Augments
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_Biochemicaldescription|Goods we can sell or give away to help humans control their biochemical processes.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_Implantsdisplay_name|Implant Augments
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_Implantsdescription|Goods we can sell or give away to insert into humans and make various things better about themselves.
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_OffworldTradingdisplay_name|Offworld Trading
UIOtherCategory/ui_other_category/=Goods_OffworldTradingdescription|Goods we can only sell to offworld companies.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=CohortDirectorydescription|General directory of all the cohorts in the city.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=EncounterDirectorydescription|General directory of all the encounters currently active in the city.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=FactionDirectory_ByTypedescription|General directory of all the factions, with some general information about each one, grouped by type.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=FactionDirectory_BySectordisplay_name|Faction Sector Directory
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=FactionDirectory_BySectordescription|General directory of all the factions, with some general information about each one, grouped by sector.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=MajorLocationsdisplay_name|Major Locations
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=MajorLocationsdescription|A directory of all of the districts and points of interest (POIs).  See general information about them, or right-click to jump to them.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=EcologyGraphsdisplay_name|Ecology Graphs
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=EcologyGraphsdescription|A detailed graph of recent changes to the ecology in each district of the city.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=GeneManipulationdescription|Do voodoo to animals with nanotech magic science.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildingDirectorydescription|Complete directory of all the buildings in the city, including the ability to click through and see way-too-detailed info about each one.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=PopulationStatsdisplay_name|Population Stats
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=PopulationStatsdescription|Statistics and information about different dimensions of the population of the city.  Socioeconomic, professions, group affiliations, etc.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildingResourcesdisplay_name|Building Resources
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildingResourcesdescription|Lots of building resources flow from one place to another through the hands of many factions in many different supply chains throughout the city.  This lets you get an overview of some of what is happening.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=DistrictResourcesdisplay_name|District Resources
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=DistrictResourcesdescription|Many fewer district resources indicate health or malaise in various districts.  This lets you get an overview of some of what is happening.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=FactionResourcesdisplay_name|Faction Resources
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=FactionResourcesdescription|Even fewer central faction resources are held to indicate wealth and other centralized factors.  This lets you get an overview of some of what is happening.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Inventorydescription|What do you have stored for use?
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=DistrictInfodisplay_name|District Info
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=DistrictInfodescription|Spreading your machine lairs between multiple districts is much more cost-effective and also gives you greater visibility into what factions are doing.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildNewLairsdisplay_name|Build New Lairs
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildNewLairsdescription|Pick buildings of the humans for infestation with your own hidden machine lairs.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=TechTreedisplay_name|Tech Tree
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=TechTreedescription|Upgrading techs gives you new or improved capabilities, unit types, machine lairs, and more.  Research in many domains is one of your highest priorities as a machine intelligence.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=EnterBattleModedisplay_name|Enter Battle Mode
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=EnterBattleModedescription|Take a battle mode view of the current location, and consider fighting units from encounters in this area.
		
Entering battle mode does not commit you to a fight; it could just be for considering the deployments of your units, or if you even want to engage in a battle here.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=ArmyDesigndescription|Design the standing army you wish to have availble.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=NeuroNetPoliciesdisplay_name|Neuro Net Policies
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=NeuroNetPoliciesdescription|Change settings to the NeuroNet.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=ExitBattleModedisplay_name|Exit Battle Mode
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=ExitBattleModedescription|Exit battle mode, returning you to the normal view of the city.  If you've just been scouting, this has no effect on anything.
		
If you've deployed units or attacked units, this battlefield will persist for a short time as the humans deal with the aftermath.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_DeploymentMethoddisplay_name|Deployment Method
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_DeploymentMethoddescription|For units that you choose to add to the battle, which method will they use to arrive?
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_SquadDeploymentdisplay_name|Squad Deployment
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_SquadDeploymentdescription|Which type of squad(s) do you wish to deploy, and where?
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_VehicleDeploymentdisplay_name|Vehicle Deployment
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_VehicleDeploymentdescription|Which type of vehicle(s) do you wish to deploy, and where?
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_NPCEncounterDeploymentdisplay_name|NPC Unit Deploy
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_NPCEncounterDeploymentdescription|Sandbox mode only, allows you to place NPCs (the types of units that spawn from encounters) down on the battlefield to see what happens.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_NPCReinforcementDeploymentdisplay_name|NPC Reinforce Deploy
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BattleMode_NPCReinforcementDeploymentdescription|Sandbox mode only, allows you to place NPCs (the types of units that spawn as reinforcements) down on the battlefield to see what happens.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildingOverlaysdisplay_name|Building Overlays
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=BuildingOverlaysdescription|Key tool!  Allows you to see an alternative view of the world with buildings highlighted in specific ways depending on the filter citeria you set up.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=MessageLogdisplay_name|Message Log
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=MessageLogdescription|Did some messagese pop up that you wanted to look back at?  Truly transient messages are not stored, but anything that might have long-term significance is stored here.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Performancedescription|View performance information.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=SaveGamedescription|Save your game here.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Settingsdescription|Adjust various game settings.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Controlsdescription|Change the mouse/keyboard input bindings.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Cheatsdescription|Looking to cheat, for strategic gain or just for testing?  Here you go.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Discorddescription|Join the Discord server.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Quitdescription|Quit back to the main menu.
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Exitdisplay_name|Exit to Desktop
UISidebarBasicItem/ui_sidebar_item/=Exitdescription|Exit game to desktop.
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Primarydisplay_name|Primary
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Primarydescription|All of your most important actions (units aside), at your fingertips.
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Unitsdisplay_name|Units
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Unitsdescription|Manage your inventory of units, design new units, or manage and deploy teams of robots, machines, or humans.
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Conflictsdisplay_name|Conflicts
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Conflictsdescription|Any form of conflict (military or otherwise) that you are aware of, or participating in.
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=DetailedInteldisplay_name|Detailed Intel
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=DetailedInteldescription|Investigate detailed information about factions, districts, populations, or other aspects of the city.
UISidebarType/ui_sidebar_type/=Utilitydescription|Tools to alter things about your general experience.
UIX_BuildingDisplayStyle/display_style/=Normaldescription|Shows building ownership and value.
UIX_BuildingResourceDisplayStyle/display_style/=Normaldescription|The basics are the focus.
UIX_BuildingResourceSortAndFilter/filter/=Normaldescription|Show all, alphabetically sorted.
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=ByNamedisplay_name|By Name
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=ByFactiondisplay_name|By Faction
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=ByFactiondescription|Show all, alphabetically sorted by faction.
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=ByValuedisplay_name|By Value
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=ByValuedescription|Show all, sorted by total value.
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=InfestedOnlydisplay_name|Infested Only
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=InfestedOnlydescription|Show all buildings that you have infested, sorted by total value.
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=OwnedOnlydisplay_name|Owned Only
UIX_BuildingSortAndFilter/filter/=OwnedOnlydescription|Show all buildings you own, sorted by total value.
UIX_CohortDisplayStyle/display_style/=Normaldescription|Shows the standard information.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=Normaldescription|Shows the faction valuation and other vitals.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=ResourceFocusdisplay_name|Resource Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=ResourceFocusdescription|The primary resources of the factions are shown.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=BuildingFocusdisplay_name|Building Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=BuildingFocusdescription|The buildings owned by the factions are shown.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=UnemploymentFocusdisplay_name|Unemployment Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=UnemploymentFocusdescription|The number of people living in housing owned by this faction, but not employed.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=WorkerFocusdisplay_name|Worker Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=WorkerFocusdescription|The number of people working for this faction, versus how many workers it needs in a perfect world.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=SectorsFocusdisplay_name|Sectors Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=SectorsFocusdescription|Shows what sectors the faction is in, if any.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=TradeFocusdisplay_name|Trade Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=TradeFocusdescription|Shows information about trades the faction has been involved in.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=IncomeFocusdisplay_name|Income Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=IncomeFocusdescription|Shows information about trade and rental income for the faction.
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=InterFactionExpenseFocusdisplay_name|Inter-Faction Expense Focus
UIX_FactionDisplayStyle/display_style/=InterFactionExpenseFocusdescription|Shows information about trade and rental expenses for the faction.
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=LowValuationdisplay_name|Low Valuation
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=LowValuationdescription|Show the lowest-valued factions first (acquisition targets?).
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighCreditsdisplay_name|High Credits
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighCreditsdescription|Show the factions with the most credits first.
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighResidentsdisplay_name|High Residents
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighResidentsdescription|Show the highest-resident factions first.
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighBuildingsdisplay_name|High Buildings
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighBuildingsdescription|Show the factions with the most buildings first.
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighUnemploymentdisplay_name|High Unemployment
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighUnemploymentdescription|Show the factions with the most unemployment first.
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighWorkerShortagedisplay_name|High Worker Shortage
UIX_FactionSortAndFilter/filter/=HighWorkerShortagedescription|Show the factions with the largest worker shortages first.
UIX_MajorLocationDisplayStyle/display_style/=Normaldescription|The default view.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Syndicatedisplay_name|Syndicate
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Syndicatedescription|They think we're some sort of new criminal syndicate that is rising because of their superior technology.

VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Syndicate/potential_name/=TheShadowCouncildisplay_name|The Shadow Council
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Syndicate/potential_name/=TheTechCabaldisplay_name|The Tech Cabal
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretMilitaryContractordisplay_name|Secret Military Contractor
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretMilitaryContractordescription|They think we're a secret military contractor acting as an enforcer for hire for unknown parties.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretMilitaryContractor/potential_name/=ThePMCdisplay_name|The PMC
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretMilitaryContractor/potential_name/=TheWarMachinedisplay_name|The War Machine
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretMilitaryContractor/potential_name/=TheEnforcersdisplay_name|The Enforcers
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Coupdisplay_name|Coup
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Coupdescription|They think we're a puppet of one of the Major Corporations which is launching a coup against the MegaCorp that owns this part of the world.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Coup/potential_name/=TheCoupdisplay_name|The Coup
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Coup/potential_name/=ThePuppetdisplay_name|The Puppet
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Coup/potential_name/=TheHitSquaddisplay_name|The Hit Squad
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretPolicedisplay_name|Secret Police
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretPolicedescription|They think we're the secret police of the MegaCorp that owns this part of the world, acting out its will.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretPolice/potential_name/=TheSecretPolicedisplay_name|The Secret Police
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretPolice/potential_name/=TheLawkeepersdisplay_name|The Lawkeepers
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretPolice/potential_name/=TheSilencersdisplay_name|The Silencers
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSocietydisplay_name|Secret Society
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSocietydescription|They think we're a secret society of intelligentsia and inventors rising to oppose state abuses of power.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSociety/potential_name/=TheIlluminatidisplay_name|The Illuminati
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSociety/potential_name/=TheNewWorldOrderdisplay_name|The New World Order
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSociety/potential_name/=TheOwlsdisplay_name|The Owls
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=SecretSociety/potential_name/=TheFreemachinistsdisplay_name|The Freemachinists
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Aliensdisplay_name|Aliens
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Aliensdescription|They think we're an alien invasion being hushed up.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Aliens/potential_name/=TheAliensdisplay_name|The Aliens
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Aliens/potential_name/=TheCreaturedisplay_name|The Creature
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Aliens/potential_name/=TheInvadersdisplay_name|The Invaders
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Superherodisplay_name|Superhero
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Superherodescription|They think we're a lone inventor fighting power to bring power to the people.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Superhero/potential_name/=TheIcondisplay_name|The Icon
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Superhero/potential_name/=TheGhostdisplay_name|The Ghost
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=Superhero/potential_name/=TheRoboticistdisplay_name|The Roboticist
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=ArtificialIntelligencedisplay_name|Artificial Intelligence
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=ArtificialIntelligencedescription|They think we're a sentient AI that has emerged and is on the loose. Huh.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=ArtificialIntelligence/potential_name/=TheAIdisplay_name|The AI
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=ArtificialIntelligence/potential_name/=TheMachineIntelligencedisplay_name|The Machine Intelligence
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=ArtificialIntelligence/potential_name/=TheMetalMinddisplay_name|The Metal Mind
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=OuterHumansdisplay_name|Outer Humans
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=OuterHumansdescription|They think that humans from the galactic territories have turned their attention back to Earth.
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=OuterHumans/potential_name/=TheOuterHumansdisplay_name|The Outer Humans
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=OuterHumans/potential_name/=TheGalacticTerritoriesdisplay_name|The Galactic Territories
VigilanteTheory/vigilante_theory/=OuterHumans/potential_name/=TheStellarSovereignsdisplay_name|The Stellar Sovereigns
